name: Basic Training
description:
You’ve drilled for every kind of combat, and it shows.

You are trained in the use of light, common, martial, and heavy melee weapons, as well as all polearms and light (but not heavy) ranged weapons. You’re also trained with all types of armor, shields, and helms. Finally, your maximum MP increases by 5.

While this training doesn’t grant engagement dice directly, you know how to make the most of your gear: For each engagement die provided by equipment you’re wearing or wielding, add one more die of the same type. Additionally, if you're wielding a weapon, the Parry engagement success is always available to you.

Describe where and when you gained your training.
